PressureObserverKnownSources.summary: NOTE Experimental The static knownSources read-only property of the interface returns an array of the values supported by the user agent in alphabetical order.

blockquote.para: The list of supported sources varies per browser, operating system, and hardware, and is evolving. This property is merely a hint about source types the user agents supports. Call and check for a NotSupportedError to see if pressure observation is possible.
